oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ON THE CHERN NUMBER OF AN IDEAL
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MANDAL, M
VERMA, JK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: local-rings
coefficients
chern number
hilbert polynomial
regular local ring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We settle the negativity conjecture of Vasconcelos for the Chem number of an ideal in certain unmixed quotients of regular local rings by explicit calculation of the Hilbert polynomials of all ideals generated by a. system of parameters.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE AMERICAN MATHEMATICAL SOCIETY, 138(6), 1995-1999
